channel.title: PlayerWithin Checker Error Problem

item.title: PlayerWithin Checker Error Problem
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

I made this code:

[code]public void within(int range){

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”){
if (person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= range && person.playerId != playerId && !person.nonWild()){
return false;
}else{
return true;
}
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

But Whenever I Compile It, I Get:

client.java:3768: cannot return a value from method whose result type is void return false; ^ client.java:3770: cannot return a value from method whose result type is void return true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

I tried turning:

}else{

into

else

and I get:

client.java:3769: 'else' without 'if' else ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Hmmm…

Read full topic
